fields.title: Senior Software Engineer
fields.description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions.
fields.requirements:
• 5+ years of experience in software development
• Strong proficiency in Python, JavaScript, and React
• Experience with Django and PostgreSQL
• Knowledge of AWS and Docker
• Excellent problem-solving skills
fields.responsibilities:
• Design and implement scalable software solutions
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams
• Mentor junior developers
• Participate in code reviews
• Contribute to technical architecture decisions
fields.education_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
fields.keywords: python, javascript, react, django, aws, docker, senior engineer

fields.title: Frontend Developer
fields.description: Join our frontend team to build beautiful and responsive user interfaces. We're looking for someone passionate about modern web technologies.
fields.requirements:
• 3+ years of experience in frontend development
• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, React, and TypeScript
• Experience with modern CSS frameworks
• Knowledge of responsive design principles
• Familiarity with Git and version control
fields.responsibilities:
• Build responsive and accessible user interfaces
• Collaborate with designers and backend developers
• Optimize application performance
• Write clean and maintainable code
• Participate in agile development process
fields.education_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
fields.keywords: javascript, react, typescript, frontend, ui, remote

fields.title: Marketing Manager
fields.description: We're seeking a creative and data-driven Marketing Manager to lead our marketing initiatives and drive brand awareness.
fields.requirements:
• 4+ years of experience in marketing
• Experience with digital marketing channels
• Strong analytical skills
• Excellent communication abilities
• Experience with marketing automation tools
fields.responsibilities:
• Develop and execute marketing strategies
• Manage digital marketing campaigns
• Analyze marketing performance metrics
• Collaborate with sales and product teams
• Lead content creation initiatives
fields.education_required: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
fields.keywords: marketing, digital marketing, campaigns, analytics, brand

fields.cover_letter: I am excited to apply for the Senior Software Engineer position. With 3 years of experience in Python and React development, I believe I would be a great fit for your team. I have worked on several large-scale projects and have experience mentoring junior developers.
fields.ai_screening_summary: Candidate shows strong technical skills in Python and React. Good communication skills demonstrated in cover letter. Experience level slightly below requirement but shows potential for growth.

fields.question_text: Describe a challenging technical problem you solved recently.
What is your experience with microservices architecture?
How do you handle conflicts in a team environment?

fields.answer_text: Recently, I solved a performance issue in our React application where the dashboard was taking 10+ seconds to load. I implemented React.memo for expensive components, optimized database queries, and added proper indexing. This reduced load time to under 2 seconds.
I have experience with microservices using Docker and Kubernetes. I've worked on projects where we broke down a monolithic application into smaller, focused services that communicate via REST APIs.

I believe in open communication and addressing conflicts directly. I try to understand different perspectives and find common ground. In my previous role, I mediated a disagreement between team members about code architecture by organizing a design review session.
